sense.def:
The distance between two places
je količina prostora med dvema krajema.

seg.quote: The town is some distance from the sea.
Farmers were travelling long distances to get supplies.

sense.def:
Če je človek
at a distance from something
ali če nekaj vidi ali se spominja
from a distance
, je daleč od tistega v prostoru ali času.

seg.quote: From a distance, he heard Jack's whisper.
Remembering this disaster at a distance, I think that it was not her fault.
